changes.title: Fixes
notes: Fixed some D1 Age of Triumphs ornaments not appearing the API view.
Fixed a small terrain vertex position calculation error.
Misc under the hood changes.

changes.title: Additions
notes: The Soundbank Viewer is now similar to the current Sound Viewer.

changes.title: Fixes
notes: Fixed some more D1 issues. *sigh*

changes.title: Additions
notes: Added entity weapons/attachments to entity viewing and exporting.

changes.title: Fixes
notes: Fixed a D1 export crash related to materials.
Fixed textures being overwritten on exports, causing larger exports to slow down.

changes.title: Additions
notes: Material Viewer 2.0. New UI and some new functionallity.
Added a config option to toggle shader HLSL exports. Can cause slow down on larger exports such as maps.
Added Ash & Iron to the API release filter options.

changes.title: Fixes
notes: Fixed D1 api crashing because I am stupid and don't test things properly
Fixed Year 1 weapon damage types not showing.
Fixed Static View filters not working.

changes.title: Additions
notes: Enabled Soundbank viewing for all game versions instead of just Destiny 1

changes.title: Fixes
notes: Cubemaps are assembled correctly when exporting.
Fixed dark cubemap exports and previews.
Fixed incorrect damage types after D2 9.0.0.8 update.
Fixed a crash when inspecting armor with set bonuses.
Fixed search not working in Entity View for versions that arent Latest.

changes.title: Additions
notes: Added main menu theming based on the current game version.

changes.title: Small Fixes
notes: Fixed a couple small but long overdue bugs when setting up a new version in Settings. (Surely I did't introduce more...)
Fixed the user agreement always setting to true regardless of the users decision...oops..

changes.title: Additions
notes: Added reference hashes (ID) to audio list and exports.
Added a config option to disable fake parallax effect.
Added the holofoil background effect to weapons in API View.
Added a config option to disable the holofoil effect.

changes.title: General Fixes
notes: Hopefully fixed a rare crash that can occur when rendering an audios waveform.
Couple material export fixes.

changes.title: More API fixes
notes: Fixed Seasonal Artifacts not showing and exporting.
Added Seasonal Artifacts and Masks to their own categories.

changes.title: Audio Fixes
notes: Audio for Edge of Fate should now work.
PLEASE report any crashes/bug/issues! This is a new system and I'm not the biggest fan of it.

changes.title: Weapon Audio Viewer 2.0
notes: The Weapon Audio Viewer has been redone. You can now export individual category sounds, all sounds in a category, or all the sounds in general!

changes.title: Bug Fixes
notes: Fixed some bugs relating to API and API exporting.
Hopefully fixed a crash relating to entity exporting.

changes.title: Edge of Fate
notes: Fixes and UI updates for Edge of Fate, please report any issues you find in #charm-tool-help in DMR or on GitHub!

changes.title: DARE 2.0
notes: DARE has been completely overhauled. Featuring a new UI, filters and item categories.

changes.title: API Item Viewer 2.0
notes: The API Item viewer has been rewritten to look more accurate and now allows selecting item plugs.

changes.title: Collection Viewer 2.0
notes: The Collection viewer has also been rewritten to be more accurate and flexible.

changes.title: Entity View 2.0(ish)
notes: The Dynamics viewer UI has been updated to match the Sound and Texture viewer, still more to be done in terms of additional functionality.
